headline: How Recent AI Moves Are Changing the Story Behind Microsoft’s Valuation
summary: Microsoft stock's narrative is shifting at the margins, with the fair value estimate edging down slightly from about $625.41 to $624.45 per share and the discount rate ticking up from 8.52% to roughly 8.53% as analysts refine their long term AI and cloud assumptions. At the same time, revenue growth expectations have nudged higher from around 15.28% to 15.30%, reflecting stronger conviction that accelerating AI adoption, expanding cloud demand, and deepened model partnerships with OpenAI and...

headline: Bubbles and Boring Bets: What’s Coming for Tech Stocks in 2026
summary: While tech giants like Alphabet Inc. and Nvidia Corp. delivered strong gains, unsung corners of the industry, like memory chips and hard disk drives, proved to be far better places for investors.  With the bull market in US stocks stretching into a fourth year, there are more concerns than ever about the sustainability of heavy spending on AI computing and whether the returns will justify the investments.

headline: Does Oracle or Microsoft have more to lose if OpenAI underperforms?
summary: The wait for Yahoo Finance's 2025 Company of the Year is over, and the winner is private artificial intelligence giant and ChatGPT parent company OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). D.A. Davidson's head of technology research, Gil Luria, told Yahoo Finance last week that stakeholder Microsoft (MSFT) will be the biggest gainer from OpenAI's success, while Oracle (ORCL) may have the most to lose if OpenAI's artificial intelligence visions don't pan out. Epistrophy Capital Research Chief Market Strategist Cory Johnson explains Oracle's business strategy while managing its debt. Johnson is also the host of The Drill Down Podcast. Be sure to watch Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with OpenAI CFO Sarah Friar. Also catch Cory Johnson explain why the market may have been over-reliant on whether OpenAI performed in 2025 or not. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Six Charts That Show How Stock Markets Got Reshaped in 2025
